detaileddescription.para: LibSteel is a software library providing an API for controlling RISC-V Steel peripheral devices (UART, GPIO, SPI, and timer), handling interrupts and exceptions, and reading/writing the control and status registers of its processor core.

listitem.para: New to RISC-V Steel? Check the Getting Started Guide.
See the Developer Guide to learn how to start a new software project for RISC-V Steel from examples.
For hardware-specific documentation, see the Hardware Docs.
